criteria: Understanding of Nutritional Content: Assesses the student's ability to identify and understand the nutritional content of various foods.
Application in Various Settings: Evaluates the student's ability to apply knowledge of healthy food choices in different environments (e.g., school cafeteria, restaurants, home).
Consideration of Variety: Assesses the student's ability to select a variety of healthy foods, ensuring a balanced diet.
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of nutritional content or healthy food choices.
Struggles to identify nutritional content and healthy choices, relying on inaccurate information.
Shows basic understanding of nutritional content but has difficulty applying it to real-world food choices.
Demonstrates a moderate understanding of nutritional content, able to identify some healthy choices with guidance.
Exhibits a strong understanding of nutritional content and can independently make healthy food choices.
Shows comprehensive understanding of nutritional content, can analyze and justify healthy food choices in various settings.
Unable to apply knowledge of healthy food choices in any setting.
Has difficulty applying knowledge of healthy food choices, even in familiar settings.
Can apply knowledge of healthy food choices in limited settings with significant prompting.
Applies knowledge of healthy food choices in some settings with moderate prompting.
Applies knowledge of healthy food choices in most settings independently.
Consistently and effectively applies knowledge of healthy food choices in a variety of settings, adapting to different constraints and opportunities.
Selects only one type of food, showing no consideration for variety or balance.
Chooses a limited range of foods, with minimal consideration for nutritional balance.
Selects foods from a few different food groups, but the diet lacks balance.
Demonstrates an effort to include a variety of foods, but the selection could be more balanced.
Selects a reasonably varied and balanced diet, with foods from most food groups.
Consistently selects a wide variety of healthy foods, ensuring a well-balanced and nutritious diet.
